ai-atk-s0401a11:1_0: The suppression should be understood in the way already described.
ai-atk-s0401a11:4_1: If, for one who is twelve years old there is no offense for one who is not fully ordained in the three classes of offenses, and he thinks, “This is aiming at the wrong time,” “This is aiming to give the full ordination,” and he does not, “There is an offense for every statement, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-atk-s0401a11:4_2: two offenses entailing acknowledgment: the five offenses entailing acknowledgment as an offense.
ai-atk-s0401a11:4_3: one offense entailing expulsion: the other makes one go beyond the any offense entailing expulsion, and one who has committed an offense entailing expulsion.
ai-atk-s0401a11:4_4: (They are) immerse on the attainment of the meditation on which all is called “non-resided”.
